remarks: The double opposite category has the same morphisms as the original category.  Intended for use with property lemmas such as ~ monpropd . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oppcbas.1 $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
2oppchomf $p |- ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) $.
